price: 55. Kaadu qhiyaamá soita ayró umeynit addunyal dago waktik sá tu-sugeweenimil xiibitta.Tonnaah usun addunyal cakkik baatil fan daggaawak sugen.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يُقۡسِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ مَا لَبِثُواْ غَيۡرَ سَاعَةٖۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَانُواْ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yuq'simu al-muj'rimūna mā labithū ghayra sāʿatin kadhālika kānū yu'fakūna
